languages.text: "На твоем месте я бы не вздумал доверять этим твоим незваным "союзникам" — подобный альтруизм редко когда не таит в себе нечто злокозненное. Узнай больше об этих существах — прикажи своим слугам изловить одного из них и предать пыткам и познавательной расправе... раз уж удовольствия от этого они получить не в состоянии".

"I wouldn't trust those uninvited 'allies' of yours — such magnanimity is wont to come with unsavoury intentions. Learn more about these creatures. Order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture it, and gain knowledge through the process... since they are incapable of finding pleasure in it."
languages.original_text: "На твоем месте я бы не вздумал доверять этим твоим незваным "союзникам" — подобный альтруизм редко когда не таит в себе нечто злокозненное. Узнай больше об этих существах — прикажи своим слугам изловить одного из них и предать пыткам и познавательной расправе... раз уж удовольствия от этого они получить не в состоянии".

traits.locale_text: "If I were you, I wouldn't trust those uninvited 'allies' of yours — that kind of altruism seldom does not have any sinister undertones to it. Learn more about these creatures — order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture them, and apply cognitive punishment to them... since they cannot find pleasure in it."

"If I were you, I wouldn't trust those uninvited 'allies' of yours — that kind of altruism seldom does not have any sinister undertones to it. Learn more about these creatures — order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture them, and apply cognitive punishment to them... since they cannot find pleasure in it."

"I wouldn't trust those uninvited 'allies' of yours — such magnanimity is wont to come with unsavoury intentions. Learn more about these creatures. Order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture it, and gain knowledge through the process... since they are incapable of finding pleasure in it."

Learn more about these creatures — order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture them, and gain knowledge through the process... since they cannot find pleasure in it."

Order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture it, and gain knowledge through the process... since they are incapable of finding pleasure in it."

Order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture it, and gain knowledge through the process... since they are incapable of finding pleasure in it."

"I wouldn't trust those uninvited 'allies' of yours — such magnanimity is wont to come with unsavoury intentions. Learn more about these creatures. Order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture it, and gain knowledge through the process... since they are incapable of finding pleasure in it."

languages.text: “我才不会相信那些不请自来的‘盟友’，像这样看似慷慨的行为，背后肯定隐藏着不可告人的目的。我们得了解更多关于这些生物的知识。命令你的仆人追捕其中一只数据天使，折磨它，在这个过程中获取知识……他们无法从折磨中获得乐趣，这真让人遗憾。”
languages.original_text: "I wouldn't trust those uninvited 'allies' of yours — such magnanimity is wont to come with unsavoury intentions. Learn more about these creatures. Order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture it, and gain knowledge through the process... since they are incapable of finding pleasure in it."

traits.locale_text: “我才不会相信那些不请自来的‘盟友’，像这样看似慷慨的行为，背后肯定隐藏着不可告人的目的。我们得了解更多关于这些生物的知识。命令你的仆人追捕其中一只数据天使，折磨它，在这个过程中获取知识……他们无法从折磨中获得乐趣，这真让人遗憾。”
“如果我是你，我才不会相信那些不请自来的‘盟友’。像这样的利他主义，几乎肯定会带来令人恶心的结果。我们得了解更多关于这些生物的知识。命令你的仆人追捕其中一只数据天使，折磨他们，在这个过程中获取知识……唉，可惜他们无法从折磨中获得乐趣。”

languages.text: «Yo no me fiaría de esos "aliados" tuyos a los que nadie ha invitado. Esa generosidad suele ocultar otras intenciones. Descubre más sobre estas criaturas. Ordena a tus sirvientes que atrapen a una de ellas, la torturen y obtengan información en el proceso... ya que no son capaces de encontrarlo placentero».
languages.original_text: "I wouldn't trust those uninvited 'allies' of yours — such magnanimity is wont to come with unsavoury intentions. Learn more about these creatures. Order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture it, and gain knowledge through the process... since they are incapable of finding pleasure in it."

traits.locale_text: «Yo no me fiaría de esos "aliados" tuyos a los que nadie ha invitado. Esa generosidad suele ocultar otras intenciones. Descubre más sobre estas criaturas. Ordena a tus sirvientes que atrapen a una de ellas, la torturen y obtengan información en el proceso... ya que no son capaces de encontrarlo placentero».

languages.text: 「招かれざる '味方 'を信用することはありません...その類の利他主義は、たいていの場合、不浄なものを運んできます。もっとこの生物について情報を入手しましょう...従者に奴らの1体を捕え、拷問し、認知罰を与えるよう命じて...奴らも喜ぶことはできないでしょうから」
languages.original_text: "I wouldn't trust those uninvited 'allies' of yours — such magnanimity is wont to come with unsavoury intentions. Learn more about these creatures. Order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture it, and gain knowledge through the process... since they are incapable of finding pleasure in it."

traits.locale_text: 「私だったら、招かれざる '味方 'を信用することはありません...その類の利他主義は、たいていの場合、不浄なものを運んできます。もっとこの生物について情報を入手しましょう...従者に奴らの1体を捕え、拷問し、認知罰を与えるよう命じて...奴らも喜ぶことはないでしょうから」
「私だったら、招かれざる '味方 'を信用することはありません...その類の利他主義は、たいていの場合、不浄なものを運んできます。もっとこの生物について情報を入手しましょう...従者に奴らの1体を捕え、拷問し、認知罰を与えるよう命じて...奴らも喜ぶことはないでしょうから」

languages.text: « Je ne ferais pas confiance à ses "alliés" non sollicités ; un tel altruisme cache souvent des intentions peu louables. Tentez d'en apprendre davantage sur ces créatures. Ordonnez à vos serviteurs d'en traquer une, de la torturer et de découvrir ce qu'elles sont... puisqu'elles n'y trouvent apparemment aucun plaisir. »
languages.original_text: "I wouldn't trust those uninvited 'allies' of yours — such magnanimity is wont to come with unsavoury intentions. Learn more about these creatures. Order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture it, and gain knowledge through the process... since they are incapable of finding pleasure in it."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne ferais pas confiance à ses "alliés" non sollicités ; un tel altruisme cache souvent des intentions peu louables. Tentez d'en apprendre davantage sur ces créatures. Ordonnez à vos serviteurs d'en traquer une, de la torturer et de découvrir ce qu'elles sont... puisqu'elles n'y trouvent apparemment aucun plaisir. »

languages.text: "Ich würde Euren ungebetenen 'Verbündeten' nicht trauen ... eine derartige Großzügigkeit ist meist mit unerfreulichen Absichten verbunden. Findet mehr über diese Kreaturen heraus. Befehlt Euren Dienern, einen von ihnen zu jagen und zu foltern, um auf diese Weise Wissen zu erlangen ... nachdem sie darin kein Vergnügen finden."
languages.original_text: "I wouldn't trust those uninvited 'allies' of yours — such magnanimity is wont to come with unsavoury intentions. Learn more about these creatures. Order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture it, and gain knowledge through the process... since they are incapable of finding pleasure in it."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde Euren ungebetenen 'Verbündeten' nicht trauen ... eine derartige Großzügigkeit ist meist mit unerfreulichen Absichten verbunden. Findet mehr über diese Kreaturen heraus. Befehlt Euren Dienern, einen von ihnen zu jagen und zu foltern, um auf diese Weise Wissen zu erlangen ... nachdem sie darin kein Vergnügen finden."

"Ich an Eurer Stelle würde diesen ungebetenen 'Verbündeten' nicht trauen. Ein solcher Altruismus öffnet fast immer etwas Schändlichem Tür und Tor. Bringt mehr über diese Kreaturen in Erfahrung. Befehlt Euren Dienern, einen von ihnen zu jagen, zu foltern und einer kognitiven Bestrafung zu unterziehen ... da sie kein Vergnügen darin finden."

languages.text: "Ben bu davetsiz 'müttefiklerine' o kadar da güvenmezdim. Böylesi yüce gönüllülüğün altından daima bir iş çıkar. Bu yaratıklar hakkında daha çok şey bilmek gerek. Hizmetkârlarına mahlukatlardan birini yakalayıp işkence yoluyla bilgi edinmesini buyur... Ne de olsa zevk alamıyorlar."
languages.original_text: "I wouldn't trust those uninvited 'allies' of yours — such magnanimity is wont to come with unsavoury intentions. Learn more about these creatures. Order your servants to hunt one of them down, torture it, and gain knowledge through the process... since they are incapable of finding pleasure in it."

traits.locale_text: "Ben bu davetsiz 'müttefiklerine' o kadar da güvenmezdim. Böylesi yüce gönüllülüğün altından daima bir iş çıkar. Bu yaratıklar hakkında daha çok şey bilmek gerek. Hizmetkârlarına mahlukatlardan birini yakalayıp işkence yoluyla bilgi edinmesini buyur... Ne de olsa zevk alamıyorlar."
